CHAT.comment: MICHAEL GARY BARBER, ET AL., Petitioners v. J. E. THOMAS, WARDEN.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN R. SADY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY B. WALL ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN R. SADY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:02 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
